REUTERS.UNKNOWN: C G f2136 reute u f BC-U.S.-DURUM-WHEAT-BONU 04-03 0084

TEXT.TITLE: U.S. DURUM WHEAT BONUS BID TO ALGERIA ACCEPTED
TEXT.BODY: The U.S. Agriculture Department said it has accepted a bid for an export bonus to cover the sale of 18,000 tonnes of U.S. durum wheat to Algeria. A bonus of 43.25 dlrs per tonne was awarded to Cam USA Inc on the shipment scheduled for June 20-30, Melvin Sims, USDA general sales manager, said. An additional 228,000 tonnes of durum wheat are available to Algeria under the department's export enhancement program, Sims said. Reuter
